text: E gelooɗi [fayɗi] ɗin Men waɗanii on ɗi jeyaaɗum e Maandeeji Alla no woodani on e majji moƴƴere, jaŋtee Innde Alla e dow majji ko ɗi saffiniiɗi si becce majji ɗen yanii haray ñaamee immorde e majji ñamminon kadi yonndiniiɗo e weeɓitotooɗo, ko wano nii, Men eltirani on ɗi belajo'o onon on jarnay
